TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StatisticFormula extends System.Object

summary.span: 통계 수식을 계산합니다.

span.span: Calculates statistical formulas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 수식 느슨하게 다음과 같은 범주로 그룹화 할 수 있습니다:; 역 배포를 포함 하 여 배포 테스트가 있습니다. 및 기본 통계 수식Formulas can be loosely grouped into the following categories: distributions, including inverse distributions; tests; and basic statistical formulas. 각 그룹에 공통적인 특성은 해당 입력 및 반환 값을 기준으로 합니다.Each group has common characteristics with respect to their input and return values.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AnovaResult Anova (double probability, string inputSeriesNames);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AnovaResult Anova(float64 probability, string inputSeriesNames) cil managed
Public Function Anova (probability As Double, inputSeriesNames As String) As AnovaResult
public: System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::AnovaResult ^ Anova(double probability, System::String ^ inputSeriesNames);

span.span: Alpha value.
The acceptable input range is between 0 and 1.

param.name: inputSeriesNames

span.span: Names of two or more input series.

param.span: 각 계열이 메서드 호출 시 계열 컬렉션에 있어야 하며 데이터 요소의 개수가 동일해야 합니다.

span.span: Each series must exist in the series collection at the time of the method call, and have the same number of data points.

summary.span: Anova 수식은 둘 이상의 데이터 그룹의 평균값 간에 통계적으로 큰 차이가 있는지 여부를 결정합니다.

span.span: The Anova formula determines the existence or absence of a statistically significant difference between the mean values of two or more groups of data.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 다음 코드에이 수식을 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As AnovaResult = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Anova(.05, "Series1,Series2,Series3") ``` ```csharp AnovaResult result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Anova(.05, "Series1,Series2,Series3"); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public double BetaFunction (double m, double n);
.method public hidebysig instance float64 BetaFunction(float64 m, float64 n) cil managed
Public Function BetaFunction (m As Double, n As Double) As Double
public: double BetaFunction(double m, double n);

span.span: First value for the beta function.
Second value for the beta function.

summary.span: 베타 함수는 베타 함수 값을 계산합니다.

span.span: The beta function calculates the beta function value.
Beta value.

remarks.format: ## Examples 다음 코드에이 수식을 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As Double = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.BetaFunction(2.3, 6.2) ``` ```csharp double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.BetaFunction(2.3, 6.2); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public double Correlation (string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName);
.method public hidebysig instance float64 Correlation(string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName) cil managed
Public Function Correlation (firstInputSeriesName As String, secondInputSeriesName As String) As Double
public: double Correlation(System::String ^ firstInputSeriesName, System::String ^ secondInputSeriesName);

param.name: firstInputSeriesName
param.span: 첫 번째 그룹의 데이터를 저장하는 개체의 이름입니다.

span.span: Name of the object that stores the first group's data.

param.name: secondInputSeriesName
param.span: 두 번째 그룹의 데이터를 저장하는 개체의 이름입니다.

span.span: Name of the object that stores the second group's data.

summary.span: 상관 관계 수식은 임의의 두 변수 사이에 존재하는 관계의 강도를 표시합니다.

span.span: The correlation formula shows the strength of the relationship that exists between two random variables.

returns.span: 두 데이터 그룹 간의 상관 관계 값입니다.

span.span: Correlation value between the two groups of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 메서드는 입력된 계열에 동일한 수의 데이터 요소가 없는 경우 예외가 throw 됩니다.The method throws an exception if the input series do not have the same number of data points. ## Examples 다음 코드에이 수식을 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As Double = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Correlation("Series1", "Series2") ``` ```csharp double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Correlation("Series1", "Series2"); ```

param.name: firstInputSeriesName
param.span: 첫 번째 그룹의 데이터를 저장하는 개체의 이름입니다.

span.span: Name of the object that stores the first group's data.

param.name: secondInputSeriesName
param.span: 두 번째 그룹의 데이터를 저장하는 개체의 이름입니다.

span.span: Name of the object that stores the second group's data.

summary.span: 공 분산 수식은 임의의 두 변수 사이에 존재할 수 있는 종속성의 수준을 측정합니다.

span.span: The covariance formula measures the degree of dependence that may exist between two random variables.

returns.span: 두 데이터 그룹 간의 공 분산 값입니다.

span.span: Covariance value between the two groups of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 메서드는 입력된 계열에 동일한 수의 데이터 요소가 없는 경우 예외가 throw 됩니다.The method throws an exception if the input series do not have the same number of data points. ## Examples 다음 코드에이 수식을 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As double = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Covariance("Series1", "Series2") ``` ```csharp double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Covariance("Series1", "Series2"); ```

public: double FDistribution(double value, int firstDegreeOfFreedom, int secondDegreeOfFreedom);

span.span: The F value for which you want the distribution.
First degree of freedom.
Second degree of freedom.

summary.span: F 분포 수식은 F 분포의 확률을 계산합니다.

span.span: The F distribution formula calculates the probability for the F-distribution.
Probability for the F distribution.

remarks.format: ## Examples 다음 코드에이 수식을 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As double = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.FDistribution(6.31, 15, 7) ``` ```csharp double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.FDistribution(6.31, 15, 7); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.FTestResult FTest (double probability, string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.FTestResult FTest(float64 probability, string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName) cil managed
Public Function FTest (probability As Double, firstInputSeriesName As String, secondInputSeriesName As String) As FTestResult
public: System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::FTestResult ^ FTest(double probability, System::String ^ firstInputSeriesName, System::String ^ secondInputSeriesName);

span.span: The alpha value.
The acceptable range is between 0 and 1.

param.name: firstInputSeriesName
param.span: 첫 번째 그룹의 데이터를 저장하는 개체의 이름입니다.

span.span: Name of the object that stores the first group's data.

param.name: secondInputSeriesName
param.span: 두 번째 그룹의 데이터를 저장하는 개체의 이름입니다.

span.span: Name of the object that stores the second group's data.

summary.span: F 검정 수식은 F 분포를 사용하는 2표본 F 검정을 수행하며 표본의 분산이 다른지 여부를 확인하는 데 사용됩니다.

span.span: The F-test formula performs a two-sample F-test using F distribution, and is used to see if the samples have different variances.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 메서드는 입력된 계열에 동일한 수의 데이터 요소가 없는 경우 예외가 throw 됩니다.The method throws an exception if the input series do not have the same number of data points. ## Examples 다음 코드에이 수식을 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As FTestResult = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.FTest(0.05, "Series1", "Series2") ``` ```csharp FTestResult result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.FTest(0.05, "Series1", "Series2"); ```

span.span: Probability for the F distribution.
The acceptable range is between 0 and 1.
First degree of freedom.
Second degree of freedom.

summary.span: 역 F 분포 수식은 F 누적 분포의 역을 계산합니다.

span.span: The inverse F distribution formula calculates the inverse of the F cumulative distribution.
F value for the F distribution.

remarks.format: ## Examples 다음 코드에이 수식을 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As Double = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.InverseFDistribution(.05, 15, 30) ``` ```csharp double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.InverseFDistribution(.05, 15, 30); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public double InverseNormalDistribution (double probability);
.method public hidebysig instance float64 InverseNormalDistribution(float64 probability) cil managed
Public Function InverseNormalDistribution (probability As Double) As Double
public: double InverseNormalDistribution(double probability);

span.span: Alpha value.
The acceptable input range is between 0 and 1.

summary.span: 역 정규 분포 수식은 표준 정규 누적 분포의 역을 계산합니다.

span.span: The inverse normal distribution formula calculates the inverse of the standard normal cumulative distribution.

summary.span: 이 분포의 평균은 0이며 표준 편차는 1입니다.

span.span: The distribution has a mean of 0 and a standard deviation of one.
Inverse of the normal distribution function.

remarks.format: ## Examples 다음 코드에이 수식을 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As double = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.InverseNormalDistribution(.05) ``` ```csharp double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.InverseNormalDistribution(.05); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public double InverseTDistribution (double probability, int degreeOfFreedom);
.method public hidebysig instance float64 InverseTDistribution(float64 probability, int32 degreeOfFreedom) cil managed
Public Function InverseTDistribution (probability As Double, degreeOfFreedom As Integer) As Double
public: double InverseTDistribution(double probability, int degreeOfFreedom);

span.span: Probability for the F distribution.
The acceptable range is between 0 and 1.
Degree of freedom.

summary.span: 역 *t* 분포 수식은 스튜던트 *t* 분포의 *t* 값을 확률과 자유도의 함수로 계산합니다.

span.span: The inverse *t*-distribution formula calculates the *t*-value of the Student's *t*-distribution as a function of probability and degrees of freedom.
Inverse of the *t*-distribution.

remarks.format: ## Examples 다음 코드에이 수식을 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.InverseTDistribution(.05, 15) ``` ```csharp double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.InverseTDistribution(.05, 15); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public double Mean (string inputSeriesName);
.method public hidebysig instance float64 Mean(string inputSeriesName) cil managed
Public Function Mean (inputSeriesName As String) As Double
public: double Mean(System::String ^ inputSeriesName);

param.name: inputSeriesName
param.span: 평균값이 필요한 데이터를 저장하는 개체의 이름입니다.

span.span: Name of the object that stores the data for which the mean value is required.

summary.span: 평균 수식은 데이터 계열에 저장된 데이터의 평균을 계산합니다.

span.span: The mean formula calculates the average, or mean, of data stored in a data series.

returns.span: 지정된 계열의 모든 데이터 요소에 대한 평균값입니다.

span.span: Mean value of all the data points in the given series.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 명명 된 입력된 계열이 존재 하지 않는 경우에 메서드 호출 시 예외가 throw 됩니다.If named input series does not exist in the at the time of the method call, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 다음 코드에이 수식을 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As Double = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Mean("Series1") ``` ```csharp double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Mean("Series1"); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public double TDistribution (double value, int degreeOfFreedom, bool oneTail);
.method public hidebysig instance float64 TDistribution(float64 value, int32 degreeOfFreedom, bool oneTail) cil managed

public: double TDistribution(double value, int degreeOfFreedom, bool oneTail);

span.span: t-value for which you want the distribution.
Degree of freedom
If set to , one-tailed distribution is used.
Otherwise, two-tailed distribution is used.

summary.span: *t* 분포 수식은 스튜던트 *t* 분포에 대한 확률을 계산합니다.

span.span: The *t*-distribution formula calculates the probability for the Student's *t*-distribution.
*t*-distribution function probability.

remarks.format: ## Examples 다음 코드에이 수식을 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As Double = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.TDistribution(1.96, 30, true) ``` ```csharp double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.TDistribution(1.96, 30, true); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.TTestResult TTestEqualVariances (double hypothesizedMeanDifference, double probability, string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.TTestResult TTestEqualVariances(float64 hypothesizedMeanDifference, float64 probability, string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName) cil managed
Public Function TTestEqualVariances (hypothesizedMeanDifference As Double, probability As Double, firstInputSeriesName As String, secondInputSeriesName As String) As TTestResult

public: System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::TTestResult ^ TTestEqualVariances(double hypothesizedMeanDifference, double probability, System::String ^ firstInputSeriesName, System::String ^ secondInputSeriesName);

param.name: hypothesizedMeanDifference
param.span: 데이터 그룹 평균 간의 가설 차이입니다.

span.span: Hypothesized difference between the means of the data groups.
Alpha value.
The acceptable range is between 0 and 1.

param.name: firstInputSeriesName
param.span: 첫 번째 그룹의 데이터를 저장하는 개체의 이름입니다.

span.span: Name of the object that stores the first group's data.

param.name: secondInputSeriesName
param.span: 두 번째 그룹의 데이터를 저장하는 개체의 이름입니다.

span.span: Name of the object that stores the second group's data.

summary.span: 분산이 같은 *t* 검정 수식은 분산이 같은 스튜던트*t* 분포를 사용하여 *t* 검정을 수행합니다.

span.span: The *t*-test with equal variances formula performs a *t*-test using Student's *t*-distribution with equal variances.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 다음 코드에이 수식을 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As TTestResult = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.TTestPaired(0.2, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2") ``` ```csharp TTestResult result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.TTestPaired(0.2, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2"); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.TTestResult TTestPaired (double hypothesizedMeanDifference, double probability, string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.TTestResult TTestPaired(float64 hypothesizedMeanDifference, float64 probability, string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName) cil managed
Public Function TTestPaired (hypothesizedMeanDifference As Double, probability As Double, firstInputSeriesName As String, secondInputSeriesName As String) As TTestResult

public: System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::TTestResult ^ TTestPaired(double hypothesizedMeanDifference, double probability, System::String ^ firstInputSeriesName, System::String ^ secondInputSeriesName);

param.name: hypothesizedMeanDifference
param.span: 데이터 그룹 평균 간의 가설 차이입니다.

span.span: Hypothesized difference between the means of the data groups.
Alpha value.
The acceptable range is between 0 and 1.

param.name: firstInputSeriesName
param.span: 첫 번째 그룹의 데이터를 저장하는 개체의 이름입니다.

span.span: Name of the object that stores the first group's data.

param.name: secondInputSeriesName
param.span: 두 번째 그룹의 데이터를 저장하는 개체의 이름입니다.

span.span: Name of the object that stores the second group's data.

summary.span: 쌍체 *t* 검정 수식은 쌍체 표본을 갖는 스튜던트 *t* 분포를 사용하여 *t* 검정을 수행합니다.

span.span: The *t*-test paired formula performs a *t*-test using Student's *t*-distribution with paired samples.

summary.span: 이 수식은 표본 그룹을 두 번 검정하는 경우와 같이 표본에서 자연 쌍이 관찰되는 경우 유용합니다.

span.span: This is useful when there is an observed natural pairing in samples (for example, when a sample group is tested twice).
A object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 다음 코드에이 수식을 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As TTestResult = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.TTestPaired(0.2, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2") ``` ```csharp TTestResult result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.TTestPaired(0.2, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2"); ```

Public Function TTestUnequalVariances (hypothesizedMeanDifference As Double, probability As Double, firstInputSeriesName As String, secondInputSeriesName As String) As TTestResult

public: System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::TTestResult ^ TTestUnequalVariances(double hypothesizedMeanDifference, double probability, System::String ^ firstInputSeriesName, System::String ^ secondInputSeriesName);

param.name: hypothesizedMeanDifference
param.span: 데이터 그룹 평균 간의 가설 차이입니다.

span.span: Hypothesized difference between the means of the data groups.
Alpha value.
The acceptable range is between 0 and 1.

param.name: firstInputSeriesName
param.span: 첫 번째 그룹의 데이터를 저장하는 개체의 이름입니다.

span.span: Name of the object that stores the first group's data.

param.name: secondInputSeriesName
param.span: 두 번째 그룹의 데이터를 저장하는 개체의 이름입니다.

span.span: Name of the object that stores the second group's data.

summary.span: 분산이 다른 *t* 검정 수식은 분산이 다른 스튜던트 *t* 분포를 사용하여 *t* 검정을 수행합니다.

span.span: The *t*-test with unequal variances formula performs a *t*-test using Student's *t*-distribution with unequal variances.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 다음 코드에이 수식을 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As TTestResult = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.TTestUnEqualVariances(0.2, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2") ``` ```csharp TTestResult result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.TTestUnEqualVariances(0.2, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2"); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public double Variance (string inputSeriesName, bool sampleVariance);
.method public hidebysig instance float64 Variance(string inputSeriesName, bool sampleVariance) cil managed
Public Function Variance (inputSeriesName As String, sampleVariance As Boolean) As Double
public: double Variance(System::String ^ inputSeriesName, bool sampleVariance);

param.name: inputSeriesName
param.span: 평균값이 필요한 데이터를 저장하는 개체의 이름입니다.

span.span: Name of the object that stores the data for which the mean value is required.

param.name: sampleVariance
param.span: 데이터가 모집단의 표본이면 를 지정하고, 데이터가 전체 모집단이면 를 지정합니다.

span.span: Specify if the data is a sample of a population; and if the data is the entire population.

summary.span: 분산 수식은 데이터 그룹 내의 분산을 계산합니다.

span.span: The variance formula calculates the variance within a group of data.
Variance within the group of data.

remarks.format: ## Examples 다음 코드에이 수식을 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As Double = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Variance("Series1", false) ``` ```csharp TTestResult result = double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Variance("Series1", false); ```

public: System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ZTestResult ^ ZTest(double hypothesizedMeanDifference, double varianceFirstGroup, double varianceSecondGroup, double probability, System::String ^ firstInputSeriesName, System::String ^ secondInputSeriesName);

param.name: hypothesizedMeanDifference
param.span: 데이터 그룹 평균 간의 가설 차이입니다.

span.span: Hypothesized difference between the means of the data groups.

span.span: Variance within the first group of data.

Alpha value.
The acceptable range is between 0 and 1.

summary.span: Z 검정 수식은 정규 분포를 사용하여 Z 검정을 수행합니다.

span.span: The Z-test formula performs a Z-test using normal distribution.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 다음 코드에이 수식을 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As ZTestResult = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.ZTest(0.2, 2.5, 4.5, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2") ``` ```csharp ZTestResult result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.ZTest(0.2, 2.5, 4.5, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2"); ```
